credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Competition Design for La Fenice, Venice: Exterior Elevation of Annex
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli (1845-1926), Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash, watercolor, graphite on paper
description: Elevation drawing of the exterior of theater "annex" showing four portals and three stories, executed in tones of tan-rose and dark gray.
name: Drawing
